title: The Right Guy
description: Just suppose along comes the right guy for you! This guy is handsome, sexy, and wealthy. Well then life might be great except for one tiny little thing. Are you the right girl for him? Remember all of your competition also think they are the right girl for him. Now suppose something comes along, an event that could help you prove to him that you are the right girl for him! Read on and find out how this girl nailed it down.
author: M.K. Hunt
